import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Navbar, Nav, Container } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./Header.css"; function Header() { const [isAccountHovered, setIsAccountHovered] = useState(false); console.log(isAccountHovered,"isAccountHovered") return ( <> {/* Primary Navigation */}
{/* Logo */} {/* Navbar Links */}
Shop Blog About Us Rewards Contact Find In Store
{/* Account and Cart */}
setIsAccountHovered(true)} onMouseLeave={() => setIsAccountHovered(false)} > Account {isAccountHovered && ( console.log("hello")&&
Log in Register
)}
Cart (0)
); } export default Header;
